lines.text: You like to do what you want, don't you?
Some people do what they have to.
The disadvantage of knowing a man all his life is a woman never expects him to change.
And when he does, it rattles her.
I don't wanna live with a woman who don't like me.
If that's the way it is, I'll take you back to Texas.
How many heifers are you gonna buy?
Daddy's going to Mexico to buy a 1000 head.
More like 50, but I like you confidence.
Can't I have my supper without hearing a plot to commit murder?
Who would've thought one ex-soldier would be such an obstacle?
You know, the Dodd brothers will never forget you killed Joe Bob?
There's only one Dodd brother left.
